name: Apocalypse
details:
FuzzA clear sustaining overdriver run into one of 5 selectable post amplifiers into a sweepable frequency equalizer circuit. What does this mean? It's basically a huge range of intense and usable overdrive, distortion, EQ, and fuzz effects in one. 
Use this pedal as a boost for solos, a great recording DI, your main guitar sound, a bass fuzz, or run any other sound you want through it to beef it up, blast it out, or energize it.
https://deathbyaudio.com/products/apocalypse?variant=5293952008223
